    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static int CRC16_CCITT​(byte[] buffer)
    CRC16_CCITT: Polynomial x16+x12+x5+1 (0x1021), initial value 0x0000, low bit first, high bit after, result is exclusive to 0x0000 0x8408 is the result of 0x1021 bitwise reversal.
    static int CRC16_CCITT_FALSE​(byte[] buffer)
    CRC-CCITT (0xFFFF) CRC16_CCITT_FALSE: Polynomial x16+x12+x5+1 (0x1021), initial value 0xFFFF, low bit is after, high bit is first, result is exclusive to 0x0000
    static int CRC16_DNP​(byte[] buffer)
    CRC16_DNP: Polynomial x16+x13+x12+x11+x10+x8+x6+x5+x2+1 (0x3D65), initial value 0x0000, low bit first, high bit after, result is XORIF 0xFFFF 0xA6BC is the result of 0x3D65 bitwise reversal
    static int CRC16_IBM​(byte[] buffer)
    CRC-16 CRC16_IBM: Polynomial x16+x15+x2+1 (0x8005), initial value 0x0000, low bit first, high bit after, result is XOR0 0xA001 is the result of 0x8005 bitwise reversal
    static int CRC16_MAXIM​(byte[] buffer)
    CRC16_MAXIM: Polynomial x16+x15+x2+1 (0x8005), initial value 0x0000, low bit first, high bit after, result is XORIF 0xFFFF 0xA001 is the result of 0x8005 bitwise reversal
    static int CRC16_MODBUS​(byte[] buffer)
    CRC-16 (Modbus) CRC16_MODBUS: Polynomial x16+x15+x2+1 (0x8005), initial value 0xFFFF, low bit first, high bit after, result is X2000000 exclusive OR 0xA001 is the result of 0x8005 bitwise reversal
    static int CRC16_USB​(byte[] buffer)
    CRC16_USB: Polynomial x16+x15+x2+1 (0x8005), initial value 0xFFFF, low bit first, high bit after, result is XORIF 0xFFFF 0xA001 is the result of 0x8005 bitwise reversal

    static int CRC16_XMODEM​(byte[] buffer)
    CRC-CCITT (XModem) CRC16_XMODEM: Polynomial x16+x12+x5+1 (0x1021), initial value 0x0000, low bit after, high bit first, result is XOR0
